name: mrtrix3
description: MRtrix3: Advanced tools for the analysis of diffusion MRI data
full_description:
*MRtrix3*: Advanced tools for the analysis of diffusion MRI data


This container encapsulates the *MRtrix3* software, all requisite dependencies, as well as limited data and commands from external neuroimaging software packages that are necessary for the operation of particular *MRtrix3* Python scripts. Please ensure when using these containers that if the functionalities of those external neuroimaging software packages are utilized, that they are appropriately acknowledged and cited (see the help pages of individual *MRtrix3* commands for recommended references).
